subject: 男主角在废墟中醒来，身边有女神的长剑
detail: 2D Chinese anime style, melancholic atmosphere,男主角 wakes up in the ruins of Lingjian Mountain, lying on cracked ground with a broken divine sword beside him, first the faint starlight illuminates his sorrowful face, then glints off the fractured blade, finally revealing the shattered starry river stretching across the ruined sky; background wind howls and faint metallic rustling echoes from the corroded sword; camera locked on subject with subtle slow push-in; Background sound: howling wind and faint metallic rustling. Voiceover says in Chinese "废墟之中，爱恨难断。"
image_detail: (2D国漫风格)，灵剑山废墟，男主角躺在地上，身边是断裂的长剑，背景是残破的星河，高清晰度，8K画质
